action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A black and white photo of an older man with a white beard sitting on a bench. He is wearing a white shirt, a tie, and dark pants. He is holding a stroller with a sign that says "The Lord Jesus Christ Will Return. Please Read Revelation Luke Psalm 1:7 21:27 97". There are other people in the background, but they are blurry. The photo is taken from a slightly low angle.

Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A maroon and yellow train engine with the number 7220 on the side. The engine is partially obscured by a gray boxcar. The engine has a single window on the side. The engine is sitting on railroad tracks.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A black and white photo of an older man with a white beard sitting on a bench. He is wearing a white shirt, a tie, and dark pants. He is holding a stroller with a sign that says "The Lord Jesus Christ Will Return. Please Read Revelation Luke Psalm 1:7 21:27 97". There are other people in the background, but they are blurry. QUESTION: Is there any greenery or foliage visible in your image?

QUESTION: Is there a person in your image?

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
